errors.invalid_data: Something went wrong. Please check the data you entered
errors.name_invalid: The name contains some invalid characters
errors.name_too_long: The name you entered is too long
errors.name_too_short: The name you entered is too short
errors.password_classes: Please use a stronger password. Use a mix of letters, numbers and symbols
errors.password_too_long: The password you entered is too long
errors.username_first_char: Your username must start with a letter or number
errors.username_invalid: Your username can contain only letters, numbers and dots (.)
errors.username_last_char: Your username must end with a letter or number
errors.username_length: Your username must be between 6 and 30 characters
errors.username_two_dots: Your username cannot contain two dots (.) in a row

step4.description:
A account allows you to access a range of services, such as email, file storage, and more.

's Terms of Service explain what to expect as you use the services, while 's Privacy Policy describes how we handle information generated or gathered as you use the services.

In order to create a account and use the services, you must accept to 's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
step4.title: One last thing...
